FIG. 5. Comparison of enzyme activities and methanol production using biogas. (A) Speci /uniFB01 c FDH enzyme activity (open bars) and total MMO activity of methanotrophs ( /uniFB01 lled bars). (B) Methane to methanol biotransformation reaction with 20 mmol L /C0 1 sodium phosphate buffer (pH 6.8), 2 g dry cells/L, inhibitors (200 and 100 mmol L /C0 1 potassium phosphate for M. methanica and M. silvestris ; 20 mmol L /C0 1 ammonium chloride for M. alcaliphilum ; 400 mmol L /C0 1 potassium phosphate and 10 mmol L /C0 1 MgCl2 for M. trichosporium ) and sodium formate (40 mmol L /C0 1 for M. methanica ; 80 mmol L /C0 1 for M. alcaliphilum ; 20 mmol L /C0 1 for M. trichosporium and 20 mmol L /C0 1 for M. silvestris ). Carbon sources used were methane ( /uniFB01 lled bars), biogas from sugarcane bagasse (bars with horizontal lines) and biogas from rice straw (open bars). FIG. 6. (A) Effect of sodium formate on M. alcaliphilum methanol production in the presence of inhibitors (open bars) and in the absence of inhibitors ( /uniFB01 lled bars). Redox regeneration ef /uniFB01 ciency, in the presence of inhibitors (circles) and in the absence of inhibitors (squares). Mean of triplicate data is represented with standard deviation for bar chart. Line chart is mean representation of triplicate data for which standard deviation is within /C6 5% range. (B) Methanol production at 14 L fermentor using methane and biogas from sugarcane bagasse by M. alcaliphilum . Methanol titer using pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled squares) and biogas (open squares); methane utilized using pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled circles) and biogas (open circles); residual formic acid in pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled triangles) and biogas (open triangles). Data is mean representation of three replicates and standard deviation /C20 10%.

source_span.caption_evidence: FIG. 6. (A) Effect of sodium formate on M. alcaliphilum methanol production in the presence of inhibitors (open bars) and in the absence of inhibitors ( /uniFB01 lled bars). Redox regeneration ef /uniFB01 ciency, in the presence of inhibitors (circles) and in the absence of inhibitors (squares). Mean of triplicate data is represented with standard deviation for bar chart. Line chart is mean representation of triplicate data for which standard deviation is within /C6 5% range. (B) Methanol production at 14 L fermentor using methane and biogas from sugarcane bagasse by M. alcaliphilum . Methanol titer using pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled squares) and biogas (open squares); methane utilized using pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled circles) and biogas (open circles); residual formic acid in pure methane ( /uniFB01 lled triangles) and biogas (open triangles). Data is mean representation of three replicates and standard deviation /C20 10%.
